name: TheLifeChurch
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Life Church Ministry, Army Veteran Pastor Thomas H. and Lady Terri Jones are passionate about helping bring wholeness to the lives of people as they get to know Jesus. We will share words of encouragement, Bible trivia and content to help listeners grow in Christ.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
